actions.name: Leap
actions.description:
Effect: The user attempts to propel themselves laterally. The user makes an appropriate Skill Check (for the situation and their physionomy) and is propelled laterally a number of meters dependent on their [Jump X] Trait, doubled. This amount is modified by the rolled Skill Check, increasing or decreasing by ⌊X / 3⌋ + 1m per 2 DoS or DoF respectively. The user may elect to spend up to 6 PP to improve the result of the roll by 10 per PP spent.

Restriction: The user may use either this Action or Jump once during their Activation or between Activations alongside another Action (such as an Interrupt), but may only one of these once until their next Activation.
